ISSUE.TITLE: Update Paypal third-party libraries to the latest verion
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: By default we're getting the following error: Could not load file or assembly 'PayPalCoreSDK, Version=1.6.1.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=5b4afc1ccaef40fb' or one of its dependencies. The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80131040) In order to fxi it we have to manually move the following setting from \Nop.Plugin.Payments.PayPalDirect\app.config file to the root web.config (not the plugin's one): ``` <dependentAssembly> <assemblyIdentity name="PayPalCoreSDK" publicKeyToken="5b4afc1ccaef40fb" culture="neutral" /> <bindingRedirect oldVersion="0.0.0.0-1.6.2.0" newVersion="1.6.2.0" /> </dependentAssembly> ``` But it's a bit wrong to copy it outside of the plugin
